Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ke kaloku aSizanga Sithumele mkhosi ngokuchasene nabantu bakubo kungazanga kube yimfuneko kananjalo kuThi ukwenza loo nto
Akuzanga kube thuba lingakanani kwakhwazwa kwaba kanye, bacima (pam)
Kwaba njani ke ukuzisola kwezicaka. Akuzanga kufike Mthunywa kubo bangaphoxisi ngaye
Ababonanga na okokuba zingaphi izizukulwana eSazitshabalalisayo kwanokuba ezo (zizukulwana) azisokuze ziphinde zibuyele kubo kwakhona
Ukanti inene, bonke baza kubuyiselwa kuThi
Kanti ke umqondiso wabo ngumhlaba ofileyo. Thina ke Siye Siwubuyisele ebomini Size Sivelise iinkozo abathi badle kuzo
Ke kaloku Sabeka apho imiyezo yemithi yesundu nezidiliya, Senza kwagqabhuka imithombo apho phakathi kuyo
Khona ukuze badle iziqhamo zaKhe. Ukanti ke izandla zabo ayizizo eziyivelisayo, ngoko ke abayi kubulela na
Makazukiswe loWo Wadala zonke (izinto) ngambini zokuhluma emhlabeni nakubo buqu nakoko bangakwaziyo
Kananjalo umqondiso kubo bubusuku. Sisusa ukukhanya kwemini kubo (ubusuku), ukuze babe sebumnyameni
Ukanti lona ilanga libaleka endaweni yalo ukuya endaweni yokuma kwalo. Oko kungummiselo kaSobunganga, uSolwazi
Nenyanga Siyiqingqela izigaba zayo (kangangokuba) ide ibuyele (ibonakale) injengentlava endala yedatilisi
Akuvumelekanga ukuba (ilanga) liyifumane inyanga, bungavumelekanga nobusuku ukuba buyifumane imini kodwa nganye kuzo indanda kwisijikelezisi sayo
